title: why is hextech crafting on Na not OCE?

replies.body:
It's being gradually rolled out to the different servers, so at the moment, Turkey and North America have it, but it'll hit Oceania soon. For more information about Hextech Crafting, check out the announcement below:
> Weâ€™ll be rolling out Hextech Crafting to each region throughout the next few weeks, starting with NA (Turkey has already been live for the beta test). 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/hextech-crafting-now-live-na
Would be nice to get a date

What i find interesting is that they roll out on the biggest servers first . 

Opposite of how other products are launched - typically they go for a smaller test market,  iron out the kinks,  then launch to a larger market.  Nz is often used by companies looking to test/ launch new products because it is a contained test environment.

I haven't been keeping track, but I think Turkey server has had Hextech Crafting for awhile and that was the "small test". They want to roll it out on all servers now, so a last minute test on a large server seems fine before adding it to the rest. Much better than adding it to OCE server and then the week after bringing it to big severs like NA and EUW and then spotting a bug right away.
